title: Roadmap!!!
body:
Finally it is here, my predictions were right about Irelia, was obvious. But I thought about a mage, but a sparkle "happy" femal burst mage with new mechanics to impact fights... that sounds interesting
Swain has also a great teaser, I am already excited to walk through a battle and kill everything that moves.

replies.body: Man, Irelia is the most boring champ they could choose, she so bland thematically. Well, at least there's Swain to look forward to.

Ahaha I think that is probably precisely why they chose her!
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
Irelia is a good choice I'm just sad it isn't morde as that would be pretty exciting

Morde would have been a better choice.
Nunu would have been a better choice.
Panth has less counterplay than irelia does.

Any of those would be good choices but so is irelia. Reworks are chosen partly based on early iteration where they try stuff for different champs so it seems likely they just had a strong concept for irelia
She won't be boring anymore after they VGU her.

I hope the new mage isn't a Yordle, we already have Lulu as a butterfly, magic, sparkle archetype thing

I hope it is a new specie from the Kumungu Jungles, a cute winged humanoid butterfly/Bug would be so nice !
Kassadin's daughter returned from the Void :p

Yeah I really hoped for the next champ to be a yordle until I've seen the roadmap.
The overlap with Lulu would likely be too big if the champ would turn out to be a yordle(though maybe it is actually a fey like Pix?)
Really like your idea of a butterfly/bug champion, would be awesome. It will be maybe a female yordle tho, I think the new champ will be link to Lulu and her lore.

I main Lux and one of my best friends main Lulu. The new champion sounds like a love child between Lux and Lulu and it just so funny.

Also Irelia, bland ? EXCUSE YOU. She's supposed to be a telekinetic blade user, a dancer with blades, and the capitain of the ionian guard. She is super cool ! Its probably because current Irelia didn't show this aspect that she's getting reworked, and now you'll see how amazing she is.
Why the assumption that it will be a female mage?

> [{quoted}](name=Ravenhale,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=hHVR6jiw,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2017-10-17T18:34:23.932+0000)
>
> Why the assumption that it will be a female mage?

A player asked a Riotler about Certanly'S new champ (that is the next one) and he answered: Certanly'S champion is nice, she is pretty cool
Must be a non roadmap comment. Little disappointing since I feel a bubbly, sparkly girl is a bit overdone (in general, not League specific).
League already had the bubbly sparkly girl too {{champion:99}}  XD but oh well, here comes more!

this was mentioned in a twitch stream of a rioter 
here is the link to the clip : https://clips.twitch.tv/EnergeticRealCrabsHassanChop

I was watching RWBY the other day and I saw some of Penny's fight scenes and thought to myself "This is what Irelia should be like." so hoping it turns out well, because the current kit doesn't really live up to the fantasy of telepathic blade fighter.

Just don't giver her a goddamn laser and I'd be fine with that

RWBY would actually make good bases for a lot of champions/reworks

The one I see most is reworking Fiora based on Weiss.
yeah, I think of a kind of taliyah passiv + camille E that mobility and  cc-reduction are the strength, low dmg,  but utility to stay without cc
im screaming internally ... i love Irelia as a character but not in-game so this certainly made my day!
Irelia <3
